title: Improve ability to investigate user.config startup issues
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
We have had many reports of problems loading mRemoteNG due to a corrupted user.config file (#983, #309, #230, others not documented in issues).

It is common enough that it is a first suggestion offered when a user complains of crashing (https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/wiki/Troubleshooting-and-Logging#crash-at-startup).

I think the time has come that we need to take a serious look at how to solve these issues, or at least improve our logging to make it easier to troubleshoot issues i...
